name: Mars building game (Alpha 0.1)
description:
Hi,

Im a Teenager from Germany and I tried making a game.

It is the first game I made and it isnt very good but I wanted to try and I had fun making it.

In this game you build a small base on Mars.

Currently there arent many Buildings, but I plan on updating the game every 2-4 weeks for more Content until it is completed.

If you find a bug in this game, please let me know.

I hope you will enjoy this game despite the fact that it is my first Project in Unity.
